name: Innsmouth Gold Coin [Erweiterung]
physical_description: A gold coin of unusual alloy, feeling slightly greasy to the touch. One side shows a fish-like humanoid creature, the other a strange, tiara-like symbol.
history: These coins sometimes appear in Arkham, usually spent by furtive-looking sailors. Most shopkeepers refuse to accept them.

mechanics.sanity_loss: 0/1 (if the owner has nightmares of the sea)
mechanics.skill_check: History or Archaeology to realize it matches no known currency.
mechanics.effect: Anyone who carries the coin for more than a week begins to feel a strange pull toward the sea and may develop a sensitivity to sunlight.

content_summary: The coin is a token of the Esoteric Order of Dagon, used to mark those with the 'Innsmouth Look'.
